title: Grand Theft Auto V
about: Grand Theft Auto V (GTA V) is an open-world action-adventure game developed by Rockstar North. Set in the sprawling city of Los Santos and the surrounding countryside, players experience the intertwined stories of three unique protagonists as they navigate a world full of crime, ambition, and opportunity.

keyFeatures.title: Switch between three playable protagonists
keyFeatures.description: Experience the story from three unique perspectives, each with their own skills and personalities.

keyFeatures.title: Massive open world
keyFeatures.description: Explore the vast city of Los Santos and the surrounding countryside, filled with activities and secrets.

keyFeatures.title: Dynamic missions and heists
keyFeatures.description: Engage in thrilling missions and multi-part heists that require careful planning and execution.

keyFeatures.title: Online multiplayer with GTA Online
keyFeatures.description: Join millions of players in GTA Online for endless multiplayer action and updates.

details.platforms: PC, PS4, Xbox One, PS5, Xbox Series X|S

systemSpecs.Processor: Intel Core i5 3470 @ 3.2GHz (4 CPUs) / AMD X8 FX-8350 @ 4GHz (8 CPUs)
